tool_description: Parses HTML content to extract structured property information including price, bedrooms, bathrooms, square footage, and property type.

website_type.description: Type of real estate website (zillow, realtor, redfin, apartments, custom)

custom_selectors.description: Custom CSS selectors for data extraction if website_type is custom

extract_description.description: Whether to extract property description text

max_description_length.description: Maximum length of property description to extract

error_messages: Empty HTML content: Provide valid HTML content containing property information.
Unsupported website type: Use one of [zillow, realtor, redfin, apartments, custom].
Missing custom selectors: When website_type is 'custom', provide custom_selectors array.
Invalid selector format: Custom selectors must be valid CSS selector strings.
No property data found: HTML content does not contain recognizable property information.
usage: Provide html_content from a property listing and specify the website_type. For unsupported sites, use website_type='custom' with custom_selectors.

property_id.description: Unique identifier for the property listing

price.description: Property price as extracted from the listing

property_type.description: Type of property (house, apartment, condo, etc.)
